body_html:
@girving @mrry I changed my script to write checkpoint to hdfs with sharded=True, and found one of the parameter server failed to output checkpoint, so I am pretty sure worker timeout and saver stuck were caused by this one parameter server.here is the stack:
stack.txt

body:
@girving @mrry  I changed my script to write checkpoint to hdfs with sharded=True, and found one of the parameter server failed to output checkpoint, so I am pretty sure worker timeout and saver stuck were caused by this one parameter server.here is the stack:
[stack.txt](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/files/768200/stack.txt)
